title: Note – 1)Height of the building permitted as per Maharashtra fire Prevention and life safety Act 200
clause_text: Note – 1)Height of the building permitted as per Maharashtra fire Prevention and life safety Act 2006 Required to be installed in the basement if area of basement exceeds 200 sq. m. Required to be provided in the basement if basement area exceeds 200 sq. m. value given in parenthesis shall apply if the basement are exceeds 200 sq. m

source_pdf.text_snippet: Note – 1)Height of the building permitted as per Maharashtra fire Prevention and life safety Act 2006
